resources.string:
In order to use this app, you will need to set it as the default app for YouTube links.


After first installing this, the next time you open a YouTube link, Android should prompt you to ask which application you want to open the link with.


Select this app ("Video Previews for YouTube") from that list, then choose the "Always" option.


If this setting ever needs to be reset, you can go into the Android Settings, under Applications, find the YouTube app, and reset the default Open With preferences.
Show Icon for App in Launcher?
Note: After changing this setting, the effects may not appear until after rebooting or restarting the device\'s Launcher.
To re-enable the launcher icon, you can return to this screen by pressing the info circle button in the upper right corner of the preview window.
